name: Auto Animate
description:
You can select Smart Animate from the list of transitions when building a prototype.


You can also apply Smart Animate with other transitions to create seamless animations.


Smart Animate allows you to quickly create advanced animations. Use Smart Animate to replicate:


- Loading sequences


- Parallax scrolling


- Touch gestures e.g. Drag, Swipe, Long-Press


- Sliders, Toggles and Switches


- Expanding content (Show more / Show Less)


- Pull to refresh
